users.registered: You have successfully registered for a new account.  Please check your email for a link to verify your account.
users.tokenSent: An email has been sent with a password reset link. Please check your email and click the link to reset your password.
users.verified: Account has been verified.  Please log in to continue.
users.successUpdate: Your account has been successfully updated.
users.logOutBody: Are you sure you want to log out?
users.updateBody: Are you sure you want to update your account settings?
users.errorUsername: A user with this username already exists.
users.errorCreating: An error occurred while creating a new user. Contact support.
users.errorLogin: Invalid username and password combination.  If you have registered, check your email for a new user verification link.
users.errorNotFound: No users with the provided email / username is found.
users.errorToken: Invalid reset token. Please request another reset token.
users.errorUsernameLen: Username must be 5 or more characters long.
users.errorPassword: Your password must be a minimum eight characters and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character -or- be a minimum of 16 characters.
users.userNotFound: The user was not found. Contact support.
users.errorUpdating: An error occurred while updating account. Contact support.
